channel.title: Docker on AgileSyndro.me
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on AgileSyndro.me

item.title: What is your container strategy?
item.description: Do any of these statements cause you anxiety? The queue is backed up with work, can you add more servers? One or more of your Amazon EC2 instances are scheduled for maintenance. Alert: production-api-3 is at 90% disk space. We need to upgrade the version of Ruby on the production system. Can I borrow the staging environment for a few days?
